homeHeader.title: Polish, Publish, & Print from a Single Platform — Grow Your Publishing Enterprise with One Nexuz
homeHeader.description: Juggling complex licensing requirements, slow paperwork, and visa approvals in Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone? At One Nexuz, our experts handle all the administrative overheads, expediting your time-to-market and empowering you to establish a global presence.  Gain unrestricted access to state-of-the-art publishing and printing facilities, fully-equipped warehouses, and close proximity to the GCC, Europe, Africa, South Asia, and the Middle East.

leftSection_5.title: How We Simplify SPC Free Zone Company Formation

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Why should I set up my business in Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone?
items.answer: Choosing SPC Free Zone offers several benefits, including 100% foreign ownership, access to state-of-the-art logistics and transportation networks, 0% personal income and capital taxes, and proximity to global markets.

items.question: Can I set up any business in the SPC Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, Sharjah Publishing City FZ allows businesses to choose from a plethora of business activities, from e-commerce and trading to fashion and publishing. You can connect with our experts to ensure your desired business activity is not restricted.

items.question: Can I own 100% of my business in Sharjah Publishing City?
items.answer: Yes, SPC Free Zone offers expats complete strategic ownership of their business- no local sponsor or agent required.

items.question: Can I get a dual license in Sharjah Publishing City Free Zone?
items.answer: Yes, SPC empowers businesses to secure a dual license and trade within and beyond free zones in the UAE.

items.question: Does One Nexuz guarantee a bank account set up in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, our business consultants can help you secure a personal or business bank account under your trade license.
